Germany → Ghana

Ghana Line Cargo Shipping

Reliable cargo shipping from Germany to Ghana. Sea freight, air freight, vehicle shipping, and personal effects — all handled by our experienced logistics team.

Get a Shipping Quote
Origin

Nürtingen / Stuttgart, Germany

Destination

Tema / Accra, Ghana

Sea Transit

21-28 days

Air Transit

3-5 days

What We Ship

Shipping Services

Sea Freight

Full container load (FCL) and less-than-container load (LCL) shipping from Germany to Ghana via Hamburg port.

  • FCL & LCL options
  • Door-to-port & door-to-door
  • Customs clearance assistance
  • Competitive rates

Air Freight

Express air cargo service for time-sensitive shipments from Germany to Accra.

  • Express delivery
  • Fragile & high-value items
  • Full tracking
  • Customs documentation

Vehicle Shipping

Roll-on/roll-off and container shipping for vehicles from Germany to Ghana.

  • RoRo & container options
  • Vehicle inspection
  • Export documentation
  • Insurance available

Personal Effects

Relocating to Ghana? We ship personal belongings and household goods safely.

  • Packing services
  • Secure handling
  • Customs-friendly documentation
  • Door-to-door delivery

Ready to ship to Ghana?

Get a competitive quote for your cargo. We handle customs, documentation, and delivery.
